greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Fixed point if (nonzero-digit product)-function at initial value 2^n is iterated.
link: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A051802(2^n) = fixed point of A051801(2^n).
maple: A051801 := proc(n) local d,j: d:=convert(n,base,10): return mul(`if`(d[j]=0,1,d[j]), j=1..nops(d)): end: A086354 := proc(n) local m: m:=2^n: while(length(m)>1)do m:=A051801(m): od: return m: end: seq(A086354(n),n=1..100); # _Nathaniel Johnston_, May 04 2011
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 21 2003
